title: Account validation error reported from mainnet.era.zksync.io JSON RPC node
body:
I'm receiving this validation error from the mainnet.era.zksync.io RPC node when broadcasting a TX:

```json
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","error":{"code":3,"message":"Failed to submit transaction: failed to validate the transaction. reason: Validation revert: Account validation error: Error function_selector = 0x, data = 0x","data":{"code":104,"message":"failed to validate the transaction. reason: Validation revert: Account validation error: Error function_selector = 0x, data = 0x"}},"id":324}
```

The raw TX:

```
0xf86d038412a05f2083070af094ea49a066c482801811d758d157319691fe52f4078701e4ab73336800808202aca0cc587cd9af33df1d2962f2f7e6d6eeeb0e7776ac2bcab957c47ff5104b4c5311a053d91c88618c9730af90e294aa171a71a8950795b934f9f0b3ddf8a2ad5ff2ab
```

I'm not seeing any issues decoding the TX: https://www.ethereumdecoder.com/?search=0xf86d038412a05f2083070af094ea49a066c482801811d758d157319691fe52f4078701e4ab73336800808202aca0cc587cd9af33df1d2962f2f7e6d6eeeb0e7776ac2bcab957c47ff5104b4c5311a053d91c88618c9730af90e294aa171a71a8950795b934f9f0b3ddf8a2ad5ff2ab

What appears to be the issue with this TX or the RPC node?
